{{Location Intro|description=<p>Wikala Funduq is located towards the southeastern side of the port. It is the port's trade hub and the center of Sumeru's commerce.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Balfour}}</ref> It is under the control of the [[Sumeru Akademiya]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Ever So Close}}</ref></p>}}
